item.description:
The word Qabalah comes from the Hebrew “QBL” meaning “received teaching/tradition”. Qabalah is a truly ancient system that can be traced back thousands of years. The Qabalah is a vital and dynamic system of spiritual growth which is used widely within the Western Mystery Tradition today from the Golden Dawn to Wicca and contemporary neo-paganism. Qabalastic thought, symbolism and ideas are incorporated in both rituals and philosophies.

Class begins at 6PM with Open Circle to follow
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Introduction to the Qabalah
